So Batgirl's gotten a redesign. But in a surprising twist, (especially with New 52) it DOESN'T suck.
!http://www.tencentticker.com/projectrooftop/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/BATGIRLMODEL2.jpg!
I especially like the snap-on cape.
